Spanning decades, the quest for the missing daggers takes Shiranui through war and ancient tradition.

programme.title: Max
programme.desc: Max, a military dog, returns to the United States after a traumatic experience in Afghanistan. However, his handler's family adopt him and strive to help him recover.

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: Maggie, a working single mother, allows Vincent, a hedonistic misanthrope, to babysit her 12-year-old son Oliver. Soon, a beautiful friendship develops between Vincent and Oliver.

programme.title: The Starving Games
programme.desc: In a deadly game orchestrated by President Snowballs, skilled archer Kantmiss Evershot, her boyfriend Dale and tech-savvy ally Peter Malarkey must rely on their wits and skills to survive.

programme.title: Romedy Now
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

programme.title: Safe Haven
programme.desc: A mysterious young woman arrives in Southport, North Carolina, and falls in love with a widowed store owner. However, her dark past intrudes in her new life.

programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: StreetDance 2
programme.desc: After an embaressing defeat, a street dancer, Ash, assembles the best dancers from all across the world for another around against the Invincible crew.

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: Isabelle plans to marry a stranger to break a family curse, which leads every first marriage to end in a divorce, in order to get married to her long-time boyfriend Pierre.

programme.title: Mune
programme.desc: Necross, the former guardian of the sun, turns evil and steals it. Now, Mune, Glim and Sohone, three friends, must work together to retrieve it back from him.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: When Gargamel learns that Smurfette knows a secret spell that can turn Naughties, Smurf-like creatures, into real Smurfs, he kidnaps her. The Smurfs set out to rescue Smurfette.

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: An archeology expert joins an Indian professor to look for a lost treasure of India. However, things take a dangerous turn when they are ambushed in their quest.

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: When a middle-aged advertising executive is gifted with the power to read women's minds, he uses it to outwit his new boss.

programme.title: Just Go With It
programme.desc: A successful plastic surgeon attempts to win over a young match teacher by convincing his secretary to pose as his soon-to-be ex-wife.

programme.title: Penelope
programme.desc: A young girl hailing from an affluent family embarks on a quest for true love to dispel a curse that has pervaded her family.

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Keith Michaels, an Oscar-winning writer, teaches at the Binghamton University on the East Coast after losing his popularity in Hollywood and falls in love with Holly, a fellow teacher.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.
